object.name: repostStory
object.description: Reposts a story on behalf of a business account from another business account. Both business accounts must be managed by the same bot, and the story on the source account must have been posted (or reposted) by the bot. Requires the can_manage_stories business bot right for both business accounts. Returns Story on success.
object.html_description: Reposts a story on behalf of a business account from another business account. Both business accounts must be managed by the same bot, and the story on the source account must have been posted (or reposted) by the bot. Requires the can_manage_stories business bot right for both business accounts. Returns Story on success.
object.rst_description: Reposts a story on behalf of a business account from another business account. Both business accounts must be managed by the same bot, and the story on the source account must have been posted (or reposted) by the bot. Requires the *can_manage_stories* business bot right for both business accounts. Returns :class:`aiogram.types.story.Story` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the business connection
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the business connection
annotations.name: business_connection_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the chat which posted the story that should be reposted
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier of the chat which posted the story that should be reposted
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the chat which posted the story that should be reposted
annotations.name: from_chat_id

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the story that should be reposted
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier of the story that should be reposted
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the story that should be reposted
annotations.name: from_story_id

annotations.description: Period after which the story is moved to the archive, in seconds; must be one of 6 * 3600, 12 * 3600, 86400, or 2 * 86400
annotations.html_description: Period after which the story is moved to the archive, in seconds; must be one of 6 * 3600, 12 * 3600, 86400, or 2 * 86400
annotations.rst_description: Period after which the story is moved to the archive, in seconds; must be one of :code:`6 * 3600`, :code:`12 * 3600`, :code:`86400`, or :code:`2 * 86400`
annotations.name: active_period

annotations.description: Pass True to keep the story accessible after it expires
annotations.html_description: Pass True to keep the story accessible after it expires
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` to keep the story accessible after it expires
annotations.name: post_to_chat_page

annotations.description: Pass True if the content of the story must be protected from forwarding and screenshotting
annotations.html_description: Pass True if the content of the story must be protected from forwarding and screenshotting
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` if the content of the story must be protected from forwarding and screenshotting
annotations.name: protect_content
